title: 2014 Milwaukee Brewers season
text:
The 2014 Milwaukee Brewers season was the 45th season for the <a href="Milwaukee%20Brewers">Brewers</a> in <a href="Milwaukee%2C%20Wisconsin">Milwaukee</a>, the 17th in the <a href="National%20League">National League</a>, and 46th overall. After leading the central division for much of the season, the Brewers collapsed in the second half and missed the playoffs. They finished 82–80, in third place.
Farm system.
The Brewers' <a href="farm%20system">farm system</a> consisted of seven <a href="Minor%20League%20Baseball">minor league</a> affiliates in 2014.
